directions: Place the diced cheese into a salad bowl. Gently stir in the peas, salad dressing, pimentos, salt, and pepper until the diced cheese separates into small squares and the salad is thoroughly mixed. Cover and refrigerate 3 hours or overnight to chill and blend the flavors.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package deluxe American cheese, diced
1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
title: Mom's Easy Pea Salad
